GSD.description:
ASoC: rt711-sdca: fix kernel NULL pointer dereference when IO error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 269be8b2907378adf72d7347cfa43ef230351a06. For more details please see the references link.
